title: @RiotKateyKhaos Sweetheart Annie (Not about the fire)
body:
Hey hopefully I haven't missed you. I see you're getting a lot of requests to add pink flames but I have a different one.

I find that Annie's eyes are to harsh in game and was wondering if it was possible to soften the eye make-up on her. especially compared to the splash art where she has such a soft face and almost blonde-white hair her hard black eyes and  white hair in game seem off. is it possible to soften them up and still keep the 750 price? thank you~

replies.body:
I'm usually around. :3 

I can't guarantee we'll make the change, but I'd be happy to pass the feedback along to the team who's been working on her. ^-^

lol!
Riot Katey Khaos, still the most active riot member on the boards!
Good to know you care about the player community's requests and ideas.
Thanks for being a part of the community! :)
I agree with this personally. Looks a lot "darker" than how she's depicted in the art. We've got Goth Annie for that. :)
Annie just wants to burn everything with those devious eyes but ok good idea.
